items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Ichikawa Danjūrō XIII, Hakuen | Shochiku Kabuki

In the fall of 2022, the KABUKI Traditional name "Ichikawa Danjuro", which has been in existence since the Edo period, will be revived for the first time in nine years. Ichikawa Danjuro XIII, Hakuen was born. To commemorate the succession Aloha shirts were designed with the themes which are symbols of KABUKI. This piece of shirts conveys the appeal of KABUKI, a traditional Japanese culture.

©In Association with Shochiku
items.name: Shochiku Kabuki Open Collar Shirt
items.shortDescription: A special piece of shirts commemorating the succession to the name of Ichikawa Danjuro, the grand feudal lord of Naritaya.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.longDescription:
- Made of 100% ultra-long cotton fibers with an elegant texture.
- Garment-washed for a tastefully casual look, high-quality feel, and soft touch.
- Updated with an on-trend, relaxed regular fit.
- The collar roll ensures a sleek look even when the top button is unbuttoned.
- Roomy in the shoulders, body, and sleeves for a tastefully casual style.
- Designed for easy arm movement.
- The stitching creates a casual style.

items.shortDescription: Updated, roomy regular fit. Made with ultra-long cotton for an exquisite texture and color.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.
